title: Definitely check this out
text:
From all over Athens, you can see the Acropolis. It is worth the trip to see the famous monument/archaeological site in person. Even if you are not a history buff, learning about Ancient Greece is interesting.

The hike up is a little strenuous but not too bad. I saw a lot of elderly people walking up.

There are signs that explain the history of all the different buildings but having a tour guide helps.

If you are going off season, no need to buy the "skip the line" ticket because there is probably not that much of a wait. Also, from November -March, the regular ticket price is reduced to 10Euros.

title: Basic tour, okay if you don’t want to worry about transportation
text:
Tour was super basic. And I’m using the “tour” loosely. You are paying for a taxi driver to take you around to popular tourist sites. You still have to pay to see everything.

Our guide was nice bit he didn’t speak a lot of English. I guess they don’t want you asking the driver any questions, lest you think he’s a tour guide. You pay extra for a tour guide.

He picked us up at our downtown hotel and took us to as much as he could in 4 hours but traffic was a little crazy.

All things considered, if you want to visit sites and have someone else worry about the transportation, this tour is for you. Other than that, I would suggest you pick something else.

title: Great hotel for business travellers
text:
I had a trip to Alpharetta and chose this hotel because I like Hilton hotels.

The rooms were nice. The air conditioner worked so well I had to turn it off because I got cold.That is saying something because this Georgia heat does not play!

Every afternoon, I made sure to get an apple-cranberry oatmeal cookie.

The hotel was in a great location. There are a lot of restaurants close by on the main road. Another plus was that there was public transport in front of the hotel.

I especially appreciated the helpful staff at breakfast.There was a woman who helped me get my to-go box and even helped me carry my stuff to my car when I needed it.

All and all, it was a good visit.
